page.title: 07LOCAL AFFAIRS IN DUDLEY (1)
page.content: Dudley Metropolitan Borough has 72 councillors;35 Conservative,35 Labour and 2 Independant. Great contrversy was caused when 2 Labour councillors changed parties (becoming Independant) thus returning council control to the Tories. The{Lord Mayor}is councillor Kate Rogers. Dudley runs many public services. Many people seem to think the most important of these is housing; councillors receive many requests for repairs. Dudley plans to erect 1125 new dwellings by 1991. An issue of great local interest at present is the {limestone caverns}that lie beneath much of the area.Some of these have recently subsided causing Dudley Town football/cricket pitch to be closed. Â£1m Gov't money is to be spent to try to make the caverns safe using a cement & coal waste mixture.
